response.summary:
Civil Engineer, MSc in Hydrology and Water Resources and PhD Candidate in Civil Engineering, with ten years of experience and more than 80 Technical Consulting projects executed in hydraulics and hydrology for public and private entities at an international level. Expertise in the road and port infrastructure sectors, as well as mining, oil & gas, and energy generation (wind, solar and hydropower)

Expert in hydrologic and hydraulic modelling and in preparing flood risk assessments, environmental impact assessments (EIA) and design of hydraulic infrastructure and river management measures. Ability to prepare technical and calculation reports and successfully manage the entire project life cycle to guarantee delivery on time, within budget and according to agreed quality standards. With the ability to communicate and inform orally and in writing progress and results to the Clients.

Interested and curious in the detection and analysis of impacts caused by extreme hydroclimatological events, integrating Machine Learning tools, Neural Networks and Deep Learning, and making use of IoT tools or remote sensors.
response.skills: Invitation to Tender, Data Analysis, Network Administration, Networking, Sales Presentations, Following Up, Reporting, Water Engineering, Geographic Information Systems (GIS), Public Works, River Engineering, Risk Management, Climate Change Adaptation, Flood Risk, Environmental Consulting, Python (Programming Language), Environmental Permitting, Water, Climate Change, Environmental Impact Assessment

profile_positions.description: Engineer in the area of Hydrology and Hydraulics for Consulting and preparation of flood studies, river analysis, reservoir management, sediment transport and impact of climate change on the river environment.
profile_positions.title: Engineer - River area

profile_positions.description:
Research regarding the hydrological equilibrium in the Ciénaga Grande Santa Marta swamp/lagoon complex (Colombia). The objective is to develop a decision-making support tool that acknowledges the confluence of multiple dynamics within the ecosystem in order to translate them into ecological impacts using neural networks.

* Key Concepts:
Drought
Risk, Hazard, Vulnerability, Exposure assessment
Impact Libraries
DPSIR Framework
Data Mining
Neural Networks
Machine Learning
Deep Learning
Remote Sensing

Additional Activities:

Assistant Lecturer in "Applied Hydrology", applying GIS for hydrological modelling

Consultancy support regarding local scouring and sedimentation in the Pumarejo bridge piles for enhancing navigation through the channel up to Barranquilla's port from Pimsa's sector.
profile_positions.title: PhD Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Water-related Research and Innovation
Hydrology | Hydraulics | Hydroinformatics

- Consultancy director in water resources for infrastructure design, and environmental and risk assessments
- Process automation through Python applications
- Hydroclimatological variables analysis by applying Machine Learning (ML)
- Research in water resources and hydroclimatic extremes for projects involving infrastructure, environmental studies and risk assessments
- Project Manager | Project Director for Consultancy | Interdisciplinary teams Leader
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Base Line (Hydrology, Water quality and Water allocation) for Cerromatoso's mining expansion Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) project (Planeta Rica, Córdoba)

Base Line (Hydrology, Water quality and Water allocation)  for TGI's gas pipeline Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) project (Tolima)

Base Line (Hydrology, Water quality and Water allocation) for Mutatá's relief road (UF4) Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) project from Autopistas Urabá Consortium (Mutatá, Antioquia)
profile_positions.title: Hydrologist

profile_positions.description: Hazard, risk and vulnerability assessment due to landslides, flooding and debris flow for the prioritised municipalities under the coverage of Cundinamarca's authority (CAR). Tibacuy's EOT case
profile_positions.title: Water Resources Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Conduct environmental studies for the project "Autopista al Mar 2" (Antioquia, Colombia) such as Environmental Impact Assessment, Emergency plans due to wastewater, Wastewater Management master plans. Involved hydraulic and water quality modelling for the Páramo and Sucio Rivers.

Wastewater modelling for "El Dorado International Airport" (Bogotá, Colombia)  water treatment plant discharge. Usage of tracers as well to calibrate hydrological and hydraulic computational models.

Sediment characterisation for "El Hatillo" coal mining pools and wastewater dumping points (El Paso, Cesar, Colombia).
profile_positions.title: Hydrologist

profile_positions.company: IHE Delft Institute for Water Education
profile_positions.description:
Conduct a research extension for the project: "Developing climate-resilient strategies for hydropower generation. The case of the Magdalena River Basin in Colombia"

Presented the outgoing results in the Summer Conference of the American Water Resources Association AWRA (25-28 June 2017. Tysons, VA. USA). Session called: “Operationalizing water resources planning using bottom-up vulnerability assessment frameworks”

Expand the research impact by writing a paper to be published in the JAWRA Journal.
profile_positions.title: Researcher Internship

profile_positions.description:
Supported the technical and environmental supervision of six (6) reservoirs design alternatives for flows regulation, hydropower and water supply purposes (Cali, Valle del Cauca, Colombia)

Designed the draining system for the expansion of the Palermo Sea Port (Barranquilla, Atlántico, Colombia) and of the new Aguadulce Sea Port (Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, Colombia)

Managed the Concession Contract signed between INCO (now National Infrastructure Agency ANI) and the Container Sea Port Company of Buenaventura TC-BUEN (Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, Colombia)
profile_positions.title: Water Resources Engineer

profile_positions.location: Calle 50 No. 13 - 62 Oficina 605, Edificio Parma. Bogotá, Colombia
profile_positions.description:
Conducted a vulnerability and flood risk assessments for four (4) municipalities in Cesar, Colombia affected in 2011.

Developed Climate and Hydrology Reports for Risk DumpingManagement Plans at the Oil Plants of Guamuez and Tumaco, attached to the Trans-Andean oil pipeline (OTA), Colombia
profile_positions.title: Hydrologist

profile_positions.description: Engineered the Hydrological component in the study to update the Environmental Management Plan of the Trans-Andean oil pipeline. (304 Km from Orito, Putumayo to Tumaco, Nariño, Colombia)
profile_positions.title: Hydrologist

company.name: ENGISIC Solucions i Consulting SL
company.description:
Som una consultoria i enginyeria especialitzada en projectes del cicle de l’aigua. El nostre equip de treball està format per un equip multidisciplinar d’enginyers especialitzats, fet que ens permet oferir un servei global i de qualitat en tots els nostres projectes. 

Treballem per buscar solucions òptimes per municipis, indústria i agricultura. Realitzem projectes d'abastament, depuració, reutilització i gestió de l’aigua y estudis en el camp de la hidrologia i la hidràulica dels cursos fluvials.
